name: uu
0:
”Alexa, trun on socket”
”Alexa, trun off socket”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
1.Download "DotStone" APP.
2.Register "DotStone" Account.
3.Buy dotstone socket.
4.Power up the socket.
5.Sign in dotstone APP Click to add device.
6.By switching wifi connected to the socket wifi.（AP connection）
7.Wait for a while after naming the device.
8.When the device list appears to configure the device this time you can use voice to find the device and control the device.
